blog.name: tumblingdownthehills
blog.title: Mais il passe pas le matelas on t'a dit !
blog.description: French. I'm between 10 and a 100 y-o. I have boobs and no idea what I'm doing. I also swear a lot. I write Elu fics when I have the will.

tags: it's literally me staying stupid shit
feel free to remind me of all our crazy theories
my memory is hazy except for some parts
it was just going to be way too long otherwise
summary: I’m bored and felt like taking a trip down memory lane, so here goes: Part 1 of those moments that got the fandom shook,...
body:
I’m bored and felt like taking a trip down memory lane, so here goes: Part 1 of those moments that got the fandom shook, excited, and all that jazz in season 3. I’m just going to spew some sentences that make no sense, advance with CAUTION. Let the clownery begin!

// The trailer //

MVP of the season : “Fuck, Skam France, you’re the worst remake and you drop a trailer like that? I didn’t plan to watch it and now… I HAVE TO!”

I have no problem admitting that I had no intention of watching season 3 of Skam Fr… But then that trailer dropped and it was over for me, I couldn’t not watch it. So I did, best decision of the year tbh. (And admit it, some of you thought the same 😉)

//

Episode 1, or “Where is Waldo?”

Full disclaimer, I started really being part of the fandom by the end of episode 2, and didn’t really pay that much attention to what the fandom was saying but I did read some stuff here and there.

1)  “What if Eliott finds the weed????” 

Lucas drops the weed and doesn’t hide it like Isak did. Cue fans freaking out about the potential “friends to lovers” plot (and holding onto it for WEEKS).

2) “Where is Eliott, David??? WHERE?” 

Aaaah, what a first week. Waiting for Eliott to appear. To be honest, it prepared us well for the rest of the season. 

3) Lucas is a snake through and through

The gang showed up at the common room meeting and proved to all of us how sneaky Lucas is when he needs people to do something for him. (JUST LOOK AT HIM!). I mean, come on, Isak told the guys he had lost the weed, clearly Lucas didn’t bother with that and promised them there would be girls and drinks. Lucas: 1, the guys: 0.

4) “HE’S HERE! And what the fuck is this piano music?”

Eliott finally shows up and the fandom lost it over Lucas’ constant glances at Eliott. The boy is already gone. And let’s not forget how a lot of people were a bit 🙄 at the piano music and how unsubtle its appearance was (Again, it was preparing us for what was next, and little did we know!).

Eliott: 1

Lucas : shook (or 5000 glances). Your pick.

5) “Look at Lucas going up to Eliott and not the other way around! Go Lucas!”

What was funny was how bold Lucas was and how, at the same time, he didn’t say much at all at first. I mean look at that: 

Special mention to that iconic shot where Lucas doesn’t realise he has two (2) people fighting for his attention:

(”Is it the start of the friends to lovers plot???”)

//

Episode 2, or … “Waldo has an IG????? And Lucas plays the piano????”

1)  ”Maxence said in an interview how stellar their love story was! That’s a sign!!!”

Aaah, what a week it was. I remember the collective freak out when people discovered that Eliott had an IG (well, the enter polaris one) and how at first, there was only a few pieces of the puzzle. I don’t remember exactly if it was that week that we started thinking it was related to Cepheus or another star, but I believe it started around that time.

Cue the fandom becoming PHD students in astronomy.

2) The Friday that got us dead, screaming: “CHEMISTRY!!!”

After waiting a whole week for Eliott to reappear (”WHERE IS HE DAVID??” PART 2)

He came back looking like that :

Making Lucas smile like that: 

And had the audacity to do that :

(special mention: “LUCAS IS THE FOX!!!”)

Lucas is a bold mec who asked Eliott to paint him like one of his french raccoons:

But then he got scared by the Dubstep dance love ritual and thought a whole lot about his life choices:

But then Eliott did that:

And it was over for all of us…

And then they looked at each other like that (”Subtlety? Don’t know her!”)

And when Lucas started the piano, the whole fandom collectively melted.

Once upon a time, it started like that : “I have a triangle if you want (since you’re going to suck at the piano)”

But Lucas thought it was funny (bless him)

But then Eliott was like that :

And couldn’t believe what he was hearing:

And then he fell in love:

And Lucas was “surprising”: (LOOK AT THAT FACE!)

And then this happened and we were all like “Wtf was that?”

But Lucas was 😍😍:

So at least he didn’t mind. Good for him.

And we all hoped there was no girlfriend involved and that we had avoided the whole cheating fuck-fest. 

But nope. 

So after a particularly heartbreaking moment (that won’t be shown here for our sake). This happened (and we all thought it too): 

And then we realised that the song Lucas played was called “I Love You” and we all lost it.

(And then we also realised that Lucas had forgotten his scarf™ and thought that Eliott was going to show up on Monday to give it back… Good time. The clownery started so early lmao).

Also for week 2 : “Where is my Eliott Slow Mo, David???”

blog.name: shipper-of-love
blog.description:
But I guess its always been that way-- wanting to be loved... to find someone that makes your heart ache in a good way ✨💫

-Brooke Davis

summary: Someone write a fanfic of imane, Lucas and eliott hanging out and just having a fun day out to get imanes mind off of the...
body: Someone write a fanfic of imane, Lucas and eliott hanging out and just having a fun day out to get imanes mind off of the bullshit she’s been going through. 😁😬 I would love you forever.

summary:
Lucas: sometimes we think we have no one when people are only waiting for us to confide in them
I know what that’s like
Me: Um,...
body:
Lucas: sometimes we think we have no one when people are only waiting for us to confide in them
I know what that’s like
Me: Um, baby? I can't speak for Arthur and Basile, but Yann was practically on his knees asking you to talk to him.

answer:

Obviously, I fucking despise him.

summary: Is there a new Skam France clip with Manon? It's not coming up for me
question: Is there a new Skam France clip with Manon? It's not coming up for me

summary: Top 5 "Eliott has beautiful eyes" moments? ( Yes, I want a post about Maxence's eyes, because they are beautiful and so...
question: Top 5 "Eliott has beautiful eyes" moments? ( Yes, I want a post about Maxence's eyes, because they are beautiful and so expressive)
answer:
Hey anon,

God who doesn’t want such a post, am I right?

I just love his eyes and they always convey so many emotions! The sad thing is that I don’t have any good gifs for this post (i don’t just wanna use random ones without being able to credit the gif maker) so I guess have to be okay with some pics:

1.

Just look at how much love he can convey with his eyes! It’s incredible!

2.

Look at our flirty boy falling more and more for his little hedgehog!

3.

Ahhhh, and here we have our boy falling head over heels!!! Just look at his eyes, do I even have to say something at this point?

4.

I’m surprised Chloé did not die that day… I mean look at our little raccoon being all like “bitch that’s my boyfriend”, “ this is a gays only event, go home!”

Plus the difference between Eliott looking at Chloé and looking at Lucas!!!!

5.

The only thing I care about is how Eliott looks at Lucas tbh…have you ever seen someone more in love?

6.

The moment they had a whole conversation about how desperately they wanted to kiss each other without saying a single word.

7.

Well….fuck…

8.

I mean…this picture speaks for itself, am I right?

blog.name: skam-screaming
blog.title: Wundershön
blog.description: Main blog is Ninjabunny101. Currently watching Druck cause everything else is done. Shay Dixon is my hero. David is our savior. She/her, aggressively lesbian, purposefully optimistic. Come talk to me! I made this account because I needed somewhere to yell about Skam so here I am

summary: I’m honestly shocked at how Skam France handled the bench scene. They screwed up in so many ways this season the bench scene was...
body: I’m honestly shocked at how Skam France handled the bench scene. They screwed up in so many ways this season the bench scene was honestly the last thing I expected them to get right, but somehow that worked? Imane got to explain herself? She didn’t let Lucas try to compare being gay to being Muslim? Good job to them I’m glad they fixed that at least

reblog.comment: I’m honestly shocked at how Skam France handled the bench scene. question: i gonna  rewtaching s3 because i miss so much mr. eliott demaury and i want to hear his voice. can we see him before end ep 10?? i just want to see him lovely ass for 3sec
answer: what a mood lmao my attention span is the worst so it’s hard to me to rewatch the whole season but sometimes i do rewatch clips 🤧 also same and can’t believe what they did to us since we’re ready to give everything we have just for three seconds with him and i really want to hope that we’re going to see him soon, also what if episode five was the last time we get to see him ☠️ sorry i’m too pessimistic right now lmao

summary: I'm pissed Lucas had to interfere and play the peacemaker. I'm pissed at the shalllow use of the og quote. Sounds fake and...
question: I'm pissed Lucas had to interfere and play the peacemaker. I'm pissed at the shalllow use of the og quote. Sounds fake and direct more to Lucas than Imane as a grand gesture. Oh and she still haven't actually reached out to Imane.
answer: i mean i guess it’s still good that manon finally understood something and i hope we well get a clip with her reaching out to imane, but yeah imane basically told her about her struggles and fears but it seems like manon totally forgot about it :((

question: top 5 skam fr soundtracks?
answer:
1. I love you - Riopy

2. Sweet Apocalypse - Lambert (THE FEELS GUYS, THE FEELS)

3. In Motion - The Range Mix - Colouring

4. Last Dance - Scratch Massive

5. Fête de trop - Eddy de Pretto
